text:
Ah, Producer-san!
Did you watch Hinana's performance?

Of course.
She seemed to be having a lot of fun.

Yeah~!
I had so much fun~

Seeing Hinana enjoying herself
must have made a lot of people happy.

If that's really the case,
then maybe Hinana is suited to be an idol after all~!

Yeah, that's right. Let's continue to create
many happy moments from now on.

(...Even though there may be
difficult moments at times.)
